alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; South Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 19 at 2:10AM MDT until September 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Unseasonably Warm Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior for any new or existing fires. * AFFECTED AREA: In North Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 275...276 and 282. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In North Central WY...Big Horn...Hot Springs...Park...Washakie. * WIND: Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the lower 80s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; South Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM
